title: Word on the beat
summary: “No I wouldn’t say that,” said Mercedes F1 boss Toto Wolff on whether he was planning to negotiate with Max Verstappen. “I always say I don’t flirt outside if I’m…

qa_pairs.question: Who is the current boss of the Mercedes F1 team?
What is the relationship between Toto Wolff and Max Verstappen in terms of negotiation?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Wolff is not planning to negotiate with Verstappen.

qa_pairs.question: In Formula 1, what does it mean when a team principal says they do not 'flirt' outside their team?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It means they are not looking to recruit drivers from rival teams.
wrong_options: It indicates a lack of interest in team partnerships.
It suggests they are looking for sponsorships.
It means they are open to driver swaps.
